title: Effect of chain length, electrolyte composition and aerosolization on the removal of per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances during electrochemical oxidation process
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00886J, Paper
Kaushik Londhe, Arjun Venkatesan
Electrochemical oxidation process (eAOP), as a remediation approach for per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) contamination, is a promising technique due to its ease of operation, low energy needs and lack...
